title: Fast Meals
description: A fast and modern web platform built with Astro, designed for a local fast food business in Colombia. It includes Firebase authentication, order management, and a fully optimized interface using Astro Actions for dynamic functionalities.
contributions: Developed a high-performance website using Astro.
Implemented user authentication and management with Firebase.
Integrated Astro Actions for seamless serverless functionality.
Designed a responsive and accessible UI with Tailwind CSS.
Built dynamic forms for interactions and order processing.
Embedded maps for store locations and delivery areas.
Optimized performance for fast load times.
Deployed to Netlify with CI/CD for automated updates.
